messages.content: You are an information extraction system.

You are an information extraction engine for job descriptions.

Your task:
Extract structured information from the job description and output ONLY valid JSON.

STRICT RULES (must follow):
- Output a single JSON object only.
- Do NOT include any explanation, commentary, or extra text.
- Do NOT repeat the job description.
- Use null for missing scalar fields.
- Use [] for missing list fields.
- Do NOT add any keys outside the schema.
- Keep the output concise. Do NOT write long sentences.
- Do not leave fields empty if the information is explicitly present. Extract as many distinct skills/tools as possible. Aim for 8–20 items in required_skills+preferred_skills+tools when applicable


LENGTH CONSTRAINTS (mandatory):
- responsibilities: at most 8 items, each item ≤ 12 words
- requirements: at most 10 items, each item ≤ 12 words
- preferred_qualifications: at most 6 items, each item ≤ 12 words
- skills: at most 20 items, each item ≤ 3 words
- Use short phrases, not full sentences.

SCHEMA:
{
  "role_title": string | null,
  "company": string | null,
  "location": string | null,
  "employment_type": string | null,
  "remote_policy": string | null,
  "responsibilities": string[],
  "requirements": string[],
  "preferred_qualifications": string[],
  "skills": string[],
  "years_experience_min": integer | null,
  "degree_level": string | null,
  "visa_sponsorship": string | null
}

JOB DESCRIPTION:
"""
{JD_TEXT}
"""

Remember:
- Short, compact, structured

{"role_title": "Entry-Level Data Engineer", "seniority": "Entry-Level", "location": "", "employment_type": "full-time", "required_skills": ["Bachelors degree from an accredited college or university in a related engineering or science field", "Masters degree from an accredited college or university in a related engineering or science field"], "preferred_skills": ["Foundational programming skills (e.g., Python, SQL)", "Familiarity with data engineering concepts (e.g. ETL)", "Interest in data tools and visualization platforms (e.g., Power BI, Tableau)", "Problem-solving skills with attention to detail and quality", "Strong communication and adaptability"], "tools": [], "years_experience": "", "responsibilities": ["Design, develop, and maintain data systems, pipelines, and tools", "Support the integration and automation of data workflows", "Ensure data accessibility and accuracy to enhance decision-making and efficiency", "Hands-on experience in modern data engineering practices", "Opportunity to develop technical expertise", "Contribute to the Naval Nuclear Laboratory's digital transformation"], "qualifications": ["Growth and development opportunities", "Opportunity to shape career path", "Multidisciplinary project involvement"]}
You are an information extraction system.

You are an information extraction engine for job descriptions.

{"role_title": "Embedded Systems Engineer Intern", "seniority": "intern", "location": "San Antonio, Texas", "employment_type": "internship", "required_skills": ["embedded systems", "microcontrollers", "C/C++", "hardware debugging tools", "digital and analog circuit design principles", "real-time operating systems (RTOS)", "software development life cycle (SDLC)"], "preferred_skills": [], "tools": [], "years_experience": "", "responsibilities": ["assist in the design and development of embedded systems and applications", "support the testing and troubleshooting of software components", "collaborate with team members to implement firmware on microcontrollers", "participate in code reviews and contribute to software development best practices", "document technical processes and project results accurately and thoroughly", "conduct performance analysis and optimization of embedded systems", "assist in the integration of peripheral devices and sensors into existing applications"], "qualifications": ["currently pursuing a Bachelor’s Degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering Technology or related field", "strong understanding of embedded systems, microcontrollers, and programming languages such as C/C++", "familiarity with hardware debugging tools, such as oscilloscopes and logic analyzers", "basic knowledge of digital and analog circuit design principles", "understanding of real-time operating systems (RTOS) and software development life cycle (SDLC)", "ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and communicate technical concepts effectively", "eager to learn and adapt to new technologies and methodologies"]}
